segments.text: Oh no, look at that sink overflowing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's just gushing out, soaking the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That poor woman is standing there, one foot in the puddle, oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying her plate so carefully, but disaster is at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy on the stoolâ€”it's tilting backward, he could fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is in the cookie jar, but that stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is reaching up, excited for cookies, but she doesn't see the danger either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, he might land in that wet mess and slip too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's a hazard zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the faucet before it floods the whole kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These kids are taking such a risk just for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to watch this unfold without anyone noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if the woman slips and hurts herself?
segments.speaker: PAR
